title: Post Game: Latest NBC News poll shows ‘a profound distrust’ in both parties
description: Chuck speaks with Bill McInturff, from Public Opinion Strategies, and Jeff Horwitt, from Hart Research, the pollsters behind the latest NBC News poll.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Chuck speaks with Bill McInturff, from Public Opinion Strategies, and Jeff Horwitt, from Hart Research, the pollsters behind the latest NBC News poll.
